Ballad_of_the_Fjords.description: A polearm used by those seeking to catch fish in the tundra. It lets none escape.
Ballad_of_the_Fjords.name: Ballad of the Fjords
Ballad_of_the_Fjords.effect: When there are at least 3 different Elemental Types in your party, Elemental Mastery will be increased by 120~240.

Beginner_Protector.description: A polearm as straight as a flag pole. Well suited to most combat situations, it has an imposing presence when swung.
Beginner_Protector.name: Beginner's Protector

Black_Tassel.description: An exceptionally powerful polearm that also offers a simple but elegant solution to the issue of the easily stained white tassel.
Black_Tassel.name: Black Tassel

Blackcliff_Pole.description: A weapon made of blackstone and aerosiderite. There is a dark crimson glow on its cold black sheen.
Blackcliff_Pole.name: Blackcliff Pole
Blackcliff_Pole.effect: After defeating an opponent, ATK is increased by 12~24% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

Calamity_Queller.description: A keenly honed weapon forged from some strange crystal. Its faint blue light seems to whisper of countless matters now past.
Calamity_Queller.name: Calamity Queller
Calamity_Queller.effect: Gain 12~24% All Elemental DMG Bonus. Obtain Consummation for 20s after using an Elemental Skill, causing ATK to increase by 3.2~6.4% per second. This ATK increase has a maximum of 6 stacks. When the character equipped with this weapon is not on the field, Consummation's ATK increase is doubled.

Crescent_Pike.description: An exotic weapon with an extremely long blade on the top and a crescent blade at the bottom. It found its way into Liyue through foreign traders. With practice, it can deal heavy damage.
Crescent_Pike.name: Crescent Pike
Crescent_Pike.obtained: Forging (1x Northlander Polearm Billet, 50x Crystal Chunk, 50x White Iron Chunk)
Crescent_Pike.effect: After picking up an Elemental Orb/Particle, Normal and Charged Attacks deal an additional 20~40% ATK as DMG for 5s.

Deathmatch.description: A sharp crimson polearm that was once a gladiator's priceless treasure. Its awl has been stained by the blood of countless beasts and men.
Deathmatch.name: Deathmatch
Deathmatch.effect: If there are at least 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by 16~32% and DEF is increased by 16~32%. If there are less than 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by 24~48%.

Dragon_Bane.description: A polearm decorated with an entwining golden dragon. Light and sharp, this weapon may very well kill dragons with ease.
Dragon_Bane.name: Dragon's Bane
Dragon_Bane.effect: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Pyro by 20~36%.

Dragonspine_Spear.description: A Spear created from the fang of a dragon. It is oddly warm to the touch.
Dragonspine_Spear.name: Dragonspine Spear
Dragonspine_Spear.obtained: Forging (1x Northlander Polearm Billet, 50x Starsilver, 8x Vitalized Dragontooth)
Dragonspine_Spear.effect: Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a 60~100% chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing 80~140% AoE ATK DMG. Opponents affected by Cryo are dealt 200~360% ATK DMG instead by the icicle. Can only occur once every 10s.

Engulfing_Lightning.description: A naginata used to "cut grass." Any army that stands before this weapon will probably be likewise cut down...
Engulfing_Lightning.name: Engulfing Lightning
Engulfing_Lightning.effect: ATK increased by 28~56% of Energy Recharge over the base 100%. You can gain a maximum bonus of 80~120% ATK. Gain 30~50% Energy Recharge for 12s after using an Elemental Burst.

Favonius_Lance.description: A polearm made in the style of the Knights of Favonius. Its shaft is straight, and its tip flows lightly like the wind.
Favonius_Lance.name: Favonius Lance
Favonius_Lance.effect: CRIT hits have a 60~100% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 12~6s.

Halberd.description: A polearm with an axe blade mounted on top that can deal quite a lot of damage. It's favored by the Millelith officers.
Halberd.name: Halberd
Halberd.effect: Normal Attacks deal an additional 160~320% DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.

Iron_Point.description: Sharp and pointy at one end, it is a balanced weapon that is quite popular among travelers.
Iron_Point.name: Iron Point

Kitain_Cross_Spear.description: A special lance that was once used by a famed warrior who guarded the Tatarigami on Yashiori Island.
Kitain_Cross_Spear.name: Kitain Cross Spear
Kitain_Cross_Spear.obtained: Forging (1x Northlander Polearm Billet, 50x Amethyst Lump, 50x White Iron Chunk)
Kitain_Cross_Spear.effect: Increases Elemental Skill DMG by 6~12%. After Elemental Skill hits an opponent, the character loses 3 Energy but regenerates 3~5 Energy every 2s for the next 6s. This effect can occur once every 10s. Can be triggered even when the character is not on the field.

Lithic_Spear.description: A spear forged from the rocks of the Guyun Stone Forest. Its hardness knows no equal.
Lithic_Spear.name: Lithic Spear
Lithic_Spear.effect: For every characters who hails from Liyue, the characters who equips this weapon gains 7~11% ATK increase and a 3~7% CRIT Rate increase. This effect stacks up to 4 times.

Missive_Windspear.description: A beacon that shows the direction of the wind. Not every idyll carried on the breeze remains a gentle thing...
Missive_Windspear.name: Missive Windspear
Missive_Windspear.effect: Within 10s after an Elemental Reaction is triggered, ATK is increased by 12~24% and Elemental Mastery is increased by 48~96.

Moonpiercer.description: It is shaped like a giant arrow and can be used as a spear.
Moonpiercer.name: Moonpiercer
Moonpiercer.obtained: Forging (1x Midlander Polearm Billet, 50x Crystal Chunk, 50x White Iron Chunk, 500x Mora)
Moonpiercer.effect: After triggering Burning, Quicken, Aggravate, Spread, Bloom, Hyperbloom, or Burgeon, a Leaf of Revival will be created around the character for a maximum of 10s. When picked up, the Leaf will grant the character 16~32% ATK for 12s. Only 1 Leaf can be generated this way every 20s. This effect can still be triggered if the character is not on the field.

Primordial_Jade_Winged-Spear.description: A jade polearm made by the archons, capable of slaying ancient beasts.
Primordial_Jade_Winged-Spear.name: Primordial Jade Winged-Spear
Primordial_Jade_Winged-Spear.effect: On hit, increases ATK by 3.2~6.0% for 6s. Max 7 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.3s. While in possession of the maximum possible stacks, DMG dealt is increased by 12~24%.

Prospectors_Drill.description: A long-handled drill that you can rarely find nowadays. It was often used in delving and in carving stones.
Prospectors_Drill.name: Prospector's Drill
Prospectors_Drill.effect: When the wielder is healed or heals others, they will gain a Unity's Symbol that lasts 30s, up to a maximum of 3 Symbols. When using their Elemental Skill or Burst, all Symbols will be consumed and the Struggle effect will be granted for 10s. For each Symbol consumed, gain 3~7% ATK and 7~13% All Elemental DMG Bonus. The Struggle effect can be triggered once every 15s, and Symbols can be gained even when the character is not on the field.

Prototype_Grudge.description: A grudge discovered in the Blackcliff Forge. The glimmers along the sharp edge are like stars in the night.
Prototype_Grudge.name: Prototype Starglitter (Formerly Grudge)
Prototype_Grudge.obtained: Forging (1x Northlander Polearm Billet, 50x Crystal Chunk, 50x White Iron Chunk)
Prototype_Grudge.effect: After using an Elemental Skill, increases Normal and Charged Attack DMG by 8~16% for 12s. Max 2 stacks.

Rightful_Reward.description: A sharp spear. Only its tip remains freshly bloodstained.
Rightful_Reward.name: Rightful Reward
Rightful_Reward.obtained: Forging (1x Midlander Polearm Billet, 50x Condessence Crystal, 50x White Iron Chunk, 500x Mora)
Rightful_Reward.effect: When the wielder is healed, restore 8~16 Energy. This effect can triggered once every 10s, and can occur even when the character is not on the field.

Royal_Spear.description: This polearm was once cherished by a member of the old nobility that governed Mondstadt long ago. Although it has never seen the light of day, it is still incomparably sharp.
Royal_Spear.name: Royal Spear
Royal_Spear.effect: Upon dealing damage to an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 8~16%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT hit removes all existing stacks.

Skyward_Spine.description: A polearm that symbolizes Dvalin's fire resolve. The upright shaft of this weapon points towards the heavens, clad in the might of sky and wind.
Skyward_Spine.name: Skyward Spine
Skyward_Spine.effect: Increases CRIT Rate by 8~16% and increases Normal ATK SPD by 12%. Additionally, Normal and Charged Attacks hits on opponents have a 50% chance to trigger a vaccuum blade that deals 40~100% of ATK as DMG in a small AoE. This effect can occur no more than once every 2s.

Staff_Of_Homa.description: A "firewood staff" that was once used in ancient and long-lost rituals.
Staff_Of_Homa.name: Staff of Homa
Staff_Of_Homa.effect: HP increased by 20~40%. Additionally, provides an ATK Bonus based on 0.8~1.6% of the wielder's Max HP. When the wielder's HP is less than 50%, this ATK bonus is increased by an additional 1~1.8% of Max HP.

Staff_of_the_Scarlet_Sands.description: One of a paired set of scepters fashioned from obsidian. Legend has it that these staves grant the right to lead the people of the desert, but no retainer now lives who can verify the proper appearance of these regalia.
Staff_of_the_Scarlet_Sands.name: Staff of the Scarlet Sands
Staff_of_the_Scarlet_Sands.effect: The equipping character gains 52~104% of their Elemental Mastery as bonus ATK. When an Elemental Skill hits opponents, the Dream of the Scarlet Sands effect will be gained for 10s: The equipping character will gain 28~56% of their Elemental Mastery as bonus ATK. Max 3 stacks.

The_Catch.description: In the distant past, this was the beloved spear of a famed Inazuman bandit.
The_Catch.name: "The Catch"
The_Catch.obtained: Inazuma Fishing Association (6x Raimei Angelfish, 20x Golden Koi, 20x Rusty Koi)
The_Catch.effect: Increases Elemental Burst DMG by 16~32% and Elemental Burst CRIT Rate by 6~12%.

Vortex_Vanquisher.description:
(Formerly Kunwu's Iris Rift)

This sharp polearm can seemingly pierce through anything. When swung, one can almost see the rift it tears in the air.
Vortex_Vanquisher.name: Vortex Vanquisher
Vortex_Vanquisher.effect: Increases Shield Strength by 20~40%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by 4~8% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

Wavebreaker_Fin.description: A naginata forged from luminscent material deep in the ocean depths. It was once the possession of the tengu race.
Wavebreaker_Fin.name: Wavebreaker's Fin
Wavebreaker_Fin.effect: For every point of the entire party's combined maximum Energy capacity, the Elemental Burst DMG of the character equipping this weapon is increased by 0.12~0.24%. A maximum of 40~80% increased Elemental Burst DMG can be achieved this way.

White_Tassel.description: A standard-issue weapon of the Millelith soldiers. It has a sturdy shaft and sharp spearhead. It's a reliable weapon.
White_Tassel.name: White Tassel
